now you know you should have ducked nigga gotchu fallin from the uppercut fucked so whats up nigga now you know you should have ducked nigga gotchu fallin from this uppercut stuck so whats up nigga

they got a nigga in the dice game im feelin lucky but the nigga just a little bigger he tryin fuck me out my cash ima blast nigga he dont know i gotta tell ya like the last nigga gotta go dont need to roll for the truck i get em up left to right my uppercutll hit em up im known to walk the streets on any block i love my niggas but i aint puttin down my glock the gun shots rang when i lose nigga and ooh nigga ima show you not to ever play a true nigga haha lay it down just to prove it and fuck the rappin motherfucker we can do this
